document_data.mainbody:
wiergus was a truly ancient demon lord known as The Chrysalis Prince, at least as old as Pale Night. He held dominion over the shaping of demonic races, and was once a tutor of Baphomet.
Dwierguss realm was known as the Flesh Forges, and was the 558 layer of the Abyss.
Dwiergus was a large, formless mass of demonic flesh whose features were constantly forming and liquifying. During battle, he occasionally wore suits of chitinous armour.
